meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 어떻게요? - 이렇게 해서 쓰면 안 돼요? How? - Like this? 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'
